pageSetting.title: 卡业绩分配日志

select.isEqual: select zh.khh,czy.hymc as xgry, zh.kh as zhdh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc jgmc,hy.hydh, hy.hymc, gxjl.zlbl, gxjl.qsrq, gxjl.jsrq, czlxms.dmms as czlx, F_TIMETOCHAR(gxrz.jlsj,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') jlsj, case when gxjl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as ggbz from xtb_hykgxrz gxrz inner join xtb_hykgxjl gxjl on gxrz.jldh = gxjl.jldh inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = gxjl.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg jg on jgcy.jgkhdxdh = jg.khdxdh inner join jxdx_kzl zh on zh.jxdxdh = gxrz.jxdxdh and zh.kh like '%$accid$%' inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gxjl.khdxdh inner join khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = gxrz.xgrdh inner join csb_dmms czlxms on lower(czlxms.dmmc)='rzczlx' and gxrz.czlx=czlxms.dmz where 1=1 and gxrz.xgrdh=$khdxdh$ and zh.kh like '$kh$%' and gxrz.jlsj between F_INTTOTIME($qsrq$,1) and F_INTTOTIME($jsrq$,2) AND F_TIMETOINT(GXRZ.JLSJ,'yyyymmdd') BETWEEN JGCY.QSRQ AND JGCY.JSRQ order by gxrz.jlsj desc,zh.kh, gxjl.jldh, gxjl.ggbz asc

select zh.khh,czy.hymc as xgry, zh.kh as zhdh, jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc, gxjl.zlbl, gxjl.qsrq, gxjl.jsrq, czlxms.dmms as czlx, F_TIMETOCHAR(gxrz.jlsj,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') jlsj, case when gxjl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as ggbz from xtb_hykgxrz gxrz inner join xtb_hykgxjl gxjl on gxrz.jldh = gxjl.jldh inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = gxjl.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg jg on jgcy.jgkhdxdh = jg.khdxdh and jg.zxrq >=$jsrq$ inner join jxdx_kzl zh on zh.jxdxdh = gxrz.jxdxdh and zh.kh like '%$accid$%' INNER JOIN KHDX_HY HY ON HY.KHDXDH = GXJL.KHDXDH inner join khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = gxrz.xgrdh inner join csb_dmms czlxms on lower(czlxms.dmmc)='rzczlx' and gxrz.czlx=czlxms.dmz where 1=1 and zh.kh like '$kh$%' and gxjl.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and gxrz.jlsj between F_INTTOTIME($qsrq$,1) and F_INTTOTIME($jsrq$,2) AND F_TIMETOINT(GXRZ.JLSJ,'yyyymmdd') BETWEEN JGCY.QSRQ AND JGCY.JSRQ order by gxrz.jlsj desc,zh.kh, gxjl.jldh, gxjl.ggbz asc

sqlMap.select:
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select zh.khh,czy.hymc as xgry, zh.kh as zhdh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc jgmc,hy.hydh, hy.hymc, gxjl.zlbl, gxjl.qsrq, gxjl.jsrq, czlxms.dmms as czlx, F_TIMETOCHAR(gxrz.jlsj,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') jlsj, case when gxjl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as ggbz from xtb_hykgxrz gxrz inner join xtb_hykgxjl gxjl on gxrz.jldh = gxjl.jldh inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = gxjl.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg jg on jgcy.jgkhdxdh = jg.khdxdh inner join jxdx_kzl zh on zh.jxdxdh = gxrz.jxdxdh and zh.kh like '%$accid$%' inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gxjl.khdxdh inner join khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = gxrz.xgrdh inner join csb_dmms czlxms on lower(czlxms.dmmc)='rzczlx' and gxrz.czlx=czlxms.dmz where 1=1 and gxrz.xgrdh=$khdxdh$ and zh.kh like '$kh$%' and gxrz.jlsj between F_INTTOTIME($qsrq$,1) and F_INTTOTIME($jsrq$,2) AND F_TIMETOINT(GXRZ.JLSJ,'yyyymmdd') BETWEEN JGCY.QSRQ AND JGCY.JSRQ order by gxrz.jlsj desc,zh.kh, gxjl.jldh, gxjl.ggbz asc
select zh.khh,czy.hymc as xgry, zh.kh as zhdh, jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc, gxjl.zlbl, gxjl.qsrq, gxjl.jsrq, czlxms.dmms as czlx, F_TIMETOCHAR(gxrz.jlsj,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') jlsj, case when gxjl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as ggbz from xtb_hykgxrz gxrz inner join xtb_hykgxjl gxjl on gxrz.jldh = gxjl.jldh inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = gxjl.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg jg on jgcy.jgkhdxdh = jg.khdxdh and jg.zxrq >=$jsrq$ inner join jxdx_kzl zh on zh.jxdxdh = gxrz.jxdxdh and zh.kh like '%$accid$%' INNER JOIN KHDX_HY HY ON HY.KHDXDH = GXJL.KHDXDH inner join khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = gxrz.xgrdh inner join csb_dmms czlxms on lower(czlxms.dmmc)='rzczlx' and gxrz.czlx=czlxms.dmz where 1=1 and zh.kh like '$kh$%' and gxjl.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and gxrz.jlsj between F_INTTOTIME($qsrq$,1) and F_INTTOTIME($jsrq$,2) AND F_TIMETOINT(GXRZ.JLSJ,'yyyymmdd') BETWEEN JGCY.QSRQ AND JGCY.JSRQ order by gxrz.jlsj desc,zh.kh, gxjl.jldh, gxjl.ggbz asc ) t
